body: Fuck it. I won't have any time for myself but I would feel bad after for not reviewing the next twenty five hentais so I'll do it.

Sorry guys, today I wasn't able to review hentais since I went to the dentist. Tomorrow it should all return to normal but for today I will not be able to do this. Sorry, once again, And until tomorrow.

Day 54 - 1325*
Finishing today with this shit. Finally done with these shitty twenty five mangas.
1/10.
